attributes.action: Remove the teaching of religious education as factual and especially as a basis for modern morailty from all schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we have come to see, epecially since the events of 11th September 2001, the adherance to religious teachings has casued the minds of young impressionable children to become poisoned by what is, we have to admit, a set of totaly unprovable myths. In 2008, we whould be leaving behind all vestigages of beleief in the supernatural, and concentrate only on what we know to be fact. By siging this petition, you will agree that the time has come for god (all of them) to be abandoned, and let us concentrate our efforts to a future based soley on fact, science and above all, reason.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
